Member Function Documentation

virtual bool iipr::CFeaturesContainer::AddFeature ( const iipr::IFeature *  featurePtr,
bool *  isFullPtr = NULL 
) [virtual]

Add new feature to the set of features.

Parameters:
featurePtrinstance of feature object. Please note, that the container takes controll over this object, so you cannot destroy this object manually. It cannot be NULL.
isFullPtrIf it isn't NULL this paramster is used to get info whether the added feature satisfy search constraints and no additionally features should be added
Returns:
true if the pushed feature is valid for this container and was inserted correctly.

Implements iipr::IFeaturesConsumer.

virtual Features iipr::CFeaturesContainer::GetFeatures ( ) const [virtual]

Get container features.

Implements iipr::IFeaturesProvider.
